title: Account Management - Propose New Service
description: After analyzing a client's ticket history, an account manager notices many security-related incidents and decides to propose a new Managed Security Service.

tasks.description: Analyze the client's ticket history for the last 6 months and categorize tickets by type.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows that 30% of incidents are security-related (e.g., phishing, malware).

tasks.description: Prepare a proposal for a Managed Security Service, highlighting how it would address the issues found in the ticket analysis.
Schedule a meeting with the client to present the findings and the proposal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The account manager creates a new opportunity to increase revenue and improve the client's security.
